edu.self.silvercalc.database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.self.silvercalc.database.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    The single responsibility of the Database class is to receive directions from Middleware to store and retrieve information from the saved file.
    Since:
    version 1.0
    Version:
    version 1.0 130417
    Author:
    Andrew Clissold

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Database() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean didAddTransactionToRecords()
      For JUnit assert statement: returns true if a transaction was added to the records.
      boolean didDeleteRecord()
      For JUnit assert statement: returns true if a record was successfully deleted from the records.
      void removeRecord(javax.swing.DefaultListModel<java.lang.String> listModel)
      Refreshes the contents of the saved file if a record is removed.
      javax.swing.DefaultListModel<java.lang.String> retrieveRecords()
      Retrieves the records from the saved file and return them as a list model.
      void setReferences(Middleware mw)
      Ensures the correct instance of Middleware is being used.
      void storeRecord(java.lang.String record)
      Appends a record followed by a newline to the saved file.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
